description:
Cowherd Okaru took care of a young black calf that transformed into a handsome young man when it was three years old. Momotarou is born from a peach, and raised by an old couple into a strong young boy. Seibei is known as a man who loves to eat soba noodles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cowlove Pass / Momotarou / Seibei the Soba Eater
Ushi Koi Touge / Momotarou / Sobakkui no Seibee
牛恋峠 / 桃太郎 / そばっ喰いの清兵衛
